Title: Tom Clancy’s H.A.W.X. 2


Year: 2010
Genre: Arcade
Developer:Ubisoft
Publisher:Ubisoft
Publication Type: License
Language: English, French, German , Italian , Polish , Spanish
Sound: English
Protection: Ubisift DRM(no Crack)


System requirements:
* CPU D 3 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3800+ @ 2 GHz
* VGA Shader Model 3 и 256 МБ
* 1 Gb Memory (XP) or 2 Gb (Vista, Win7)
* 9 GB HDD
